prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a shell and tentacle-like features.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a prehistoric creature with a hard shell.
Generate an ancient-looking Pokemon that thrives in aquatic environments.
Imagine a Pokemon with a rocky exterior and a soft underbelly.
